00030 , _samplers( kMaxSamplerCount )

00049 //----------------------------------------------------------
00050 unsigned int
00051 GrAfterEffect::InitParam( const char* name, const URef< UExpr >* values )
00052 {
00054         B_ASSERT( name != 0 );
00055         B_ASSERT( values != 0 );
00056 
00058         unsigned int handle = _params.GetElemCount();
00059 
00061         if ( !_shader->InitUserParam( name, handle ) )
00062                 return ~0;
00063 
00065         SUserParam& param = _params.Push();
00066         param.name = name;
00067         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 4; ++i )
00068         {
00069                 B_ASSERT( values[ i ] != 0 );
00070                 param.expr[ i ] = values[ i ];
00071                 param.cache[ i ] = 0.0f;
00072         }
00073 
00075         return handle;
00076 }
00077 
00078 //----------------------------------------------------------
00079 unsigned int
00080 GrAfterEffect::GetParamHandle( const char* name ) const
00081 {
00083         B_ASSERT( name != 0 );
00084 
00086         const unsigned int paramCount = _params.GetElemCount();
00087         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < paramCount; ++i )
00088         {
00089                 if ( strcmp( _params[ i ].name.c_str(), name ) == 0 )
00090                         return i;
00091         }
00092 
00094         return ~0;
00095 }

00099 GrAfterEffect::SetParamExprs( unsigned int handle, const URef< UExpr >* values )

00102         B_ASSERT( handle < _params.GetElemCount() );
00103         B_ASSERT( values != 0 );
00104 
00106         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 4; ++i )
00107         {
00108                 B_ASSERT( values[ i ] != 0 );
00109                 _params[ handle ].expr[ i ] = values[ i ];
00110         }

00118         B_ASSERT( handle < _params.GetElemCount() );
00119         B_ASSERT( values != 0 );
00120 
00122         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 4; ++i )
00123                 values[ i ] = _params[ handle ].expr[ i ];

00126 //----------------------------------------------------------
00127 unsigned int
00128 GrAfterEffect::InitSampler( const char* name, const GrTextureStage& textureStage )
00129 {
00131         B_ASSERT( name != 0 );
00132         B_ASSERT( textureStage.GetTexture() != 0 );
00133         B_ASSERT( _samplers.GetElemCount() < kMaxSamplerCount );
00134 
00136         unsigned int handle = _samplers.GetElemCount();
00137 
00139         if ( !_shader->BindUserSampler( name, handle ) )
00140                 return ~0;
00141 
00143         SUserSampler& sampler = _samplers.Push();
00144 
00146         sampler.name = name;
00147         sampler.stage = textureStage;
00148 
00150         return handle;
00151 }
00152

00158         B_ASSERT( name != 0 );

00164                 if ( strcmp( _samplers[ i ].name.c_str(), name ) == 0 )
00165                         return i;

00174 GrAfterEffect::GetSamplerStage( unsigned int handle ) const

00183 GrAfterEffect::SetSamplerStage( unsigned int handle, const GrTextureStage& stage )
00184 {

00190 //----------------------------------------------------------
00191 void
00192 GrAfterEffect::Update()
00193 {
00195         const unsigned int paramCount = _params.GetElemCount();
00196         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < paramCount; ++i )
00197         {
00199                 SUserParam& curParam = _params[ i ];
00200                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < 4; ++j )
00201                 {
00202                         B_ASSERT( curParam.expr[ j ] );
00203                         curParam.cache[ j ] = curParam.expr[ j ]->GetValue();
00204                 }
00205         }
00206 }
00207 
00208 //----------------------------------------------------------
00209 void
00210 GrAfterEffect::ApplyShaderParams()
00211 {
00212         const unsigned int paramCount = _params.GetElemCount();
00213         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < paramCount; ++i )
00214                 _shader->SetUserParam4fv( i, _params[ i ].cache );
00215 }
00216 
00217 //----------------------------------------------------------
00218 void
00219 GrAfterEffect::ApplySamplerStates()
00220 {
00221         const unsigned int samplerCount = _samplers.GetElemCount();
00222         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < samplerCount; ++i )
00223                 _samplers[ i ].stage.BindTexture( i );
00224 }
